channel.title: What they dont tell you
channel.description:
Hello :o After hours of browsing my sisters computer for some fit girls on Myspace, i found this. Note: I am not vegetarian.
[url=http://www.peta2.com/p2vsk2_flash/]What They Dont tell you[/url]
Post what you think about this.
-Ollie

item.title: What they dont tell you
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Mopman:

almost certainly have a shitty diet themselves.

Namely take-away every night of the week?

Read full topic

item.title: What they dont tell you
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:19, topic:132822”][quote author=exe626 link=topic=184074.msg1670939#msg1670939 date=1186996477]
Vegetarians don’t get everything they need when they eat, so they take vitamins. The vitamins they take don’t supply what the actual thing could give, it helps but they aren’t as healthy. Just because they’re eating healthy food, doesn’t mean they’re healthy.
[/quote]

That’s actually bullshit, commonly spouted by “anti-vegetarians”. Vegetable protein provides everything “meat” protein does, except for certain amino acids which are present in other foods. If you know your diet, and combine foods containing the essential acids with vegetables in the same meal, you are eating just as healthily as a meat-eating person is.

Also, there is biological evidence that humans are not designed to be omnivores at all, but herbivores. Of course, there is also evidence to the contrary (our teeth, mainly) but did you know that many cancers of our internals (bowels/intestines etc.) would be a lot less common/would not exist did we not eat meat.

I am not a vegetarian, by the way, I love my meat - it does piss me off when people with no biological knowledge spout this “omg vegetarianz are teh unhealthy!!!oneone” bullshit, however. Especially when they almost certainly have a shitty diet themselves.[/quote]

thanks, at leat someone knows what they are talking about

Read full topic

item.title: What they dont tell you
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

exe626:

Vegetarians don’t get everything they need when they eat, so they take vitamins. The vitamins they take don’t supply what the actual thing could give, it helps but they aren’t as healthy. Just because they’re eating healthy food, doesn’t mean they’re healthy.

That’s actually bullshit, commonly spouted by “anti-vegetarians”. Vegetable protein provides everything “meat” protein does, except for certain amino acids which are present in other foods. If you know your diet, and combine foods containing the essential acids with vegetables in the same meal, you are eating just as healthily as a meat-eating person is.

Also, there is biological evidence that humans are not designed to be omnivores at all, but herbivores. Of course, there is also evidence to the contrary (our teeth, mainly) but did you know that many cancers of our internals (bowels/intestines etc.) would be a lot less common/would not exist did we not eat meat.

I am not a vegetarian, by the way, I love my meat - it does piss me off when people with no biological knowledge spout this “omg vegetarianz are teh unhealthy!!!oneone” bullshit, however. Especially when they almost certainly have a shitty diet themselves.

Read full topic

item.title: What they dont tell you
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Vegetarian, “the practice of not consuming the flesh of any animal (including sea animals) with or without also eschewing other animal derivatives, such as dairy products or eggs.” They don’t get protein or anything, so they are required to take certain pills to get all of their Diet they will need to stay alive and healthy. The pills they take don’t supply as well as the real thing, so they don’t stay as healthy.

Read full topic

item.description:
@bobby wrote:

maybe you get more, but i just ate a lot of tofu and beans and nuts and things… also, i didn’t need any vitamin pills, i got all i needed from what i ate.

maybe you need pills if you are vegan tho,

Read full topic

item.title: What they dont tell you
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

They can’t use drugs on them because their afraid of what will happen to the meat their trying to sell, and slitting their throat is illegal, that can get you 5 years for animal cruelty, no matter the reason. They kill them in their sleep, quick and painless, so they never knew. The use of a slaughter house is to fix the meat after the animal is dead.

Read full topic

item.title: What they dont tell you
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

Stay away from PeTA. They are just a bunch of crazy vegetarians. I love eating meat, even though it may come from slaughter houses like those that we all saw in that link. PeTA calls it cruel, and I’m not denying that some of it is, but face the facts. We need meat to survive. The point where PeTA says eating meat makes you fat is totally false. Becuase of the STEAK I EAT, I’ve gained about 10 pounds of lean muscle mass over the past 5 weeks. But, I do agree that some of the techniques used to harvest animals are inhumane, especially where they slit a cow’s throat and let it bleed to death. My main point is: IF YOU HAVE TO HARVEST ANIMALS FOR THEIR MEAT, AT LEAST USE SOME SORT OF DRUG THAT WILL KILL THEM OR MAKE THEM UNCONSIOUS SO THAT THEY DO NOT FEEL ANY PAIN.

Anyone have a response…?

Read full topic
